query: CREATE TABLE TIMETZ_TBL (f1 time(2) with time zone)
INSERT INTO TIMETZ_TBL VALUES ('11:59:59.99 PM PDT')
expected: INSERT INTO timetz_tbl VALUES ('11:59:59.99 PM PDT')

query: INSERT INTO TIMETZ_TBL VALUES ('15:36:39 MSK m2')
expected: INSERT INTO timetz_tbl VALUES ('15:36:39 MSK m2')

query: SELECT f1 AS "Time TZ" FROM TIMETZ_TBL
expected: SELECT f1 AS "Time TZ" FROM timetz_tbl

query: SELECT f1 AS "Three" FROM TIMETZ_TBL WHERE f1 < '05:06:07-07'
expected: SELECT f1 AS "Three" FROM timetz_tbl WHERE f1 < '05:06:07-07'

query: SELECT f1 AS "Seven" FROM TIMETZ_TBL WHERE f1 > '05:06:07-07'
expected: SELECT f1 AS "Seven" FROM timetz_tbl WHERE f1 > '05:06:07-07'

query: SELECT f1 AS "None" FROM TIMETZ_TBL WHERE f1 < '00:00-07'
expected: SELECT f1 AS "None" FROM timetz_tbl WHERE f1 < '00:00-07'

query: SELECT f1 AS "Ten" FROM TIMETZ_TBL WHERE f1 >= '00:00-07'
expected: SELECT f1 AS "Ten" FROM timetz_tbl WHERE f1 >= '00:00-07'

query: SELECT f1 + time with time zone '00:01' AS "Illegal" FROM TIMETZ_TBL
expected: SELECT f1 + CAST('00:01' AS TIMETZ) AS "Illegal" FROM timetz_tbl

query: SELECT EXTRACT(MICROSECOND FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
expected: SELECT extract(microsecond FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(MILLISECOND FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
expected: SELECT extract(millisecond FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(SECOND      FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
expected: SELECT extract(second FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(MINUTE      FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
expected: SELECT extract(minute FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(HOUR        FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
expected: SELECT extract(hour FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(DAY         FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
expected: SELECT extract(day FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(FORTNIGHT   FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
expected: SELECT extract(fortnight FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(TIMEZONE    FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04:30')
expected: SELECT extract(timezone FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04:30' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(TIMEZONE_HOUR   FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04:30')
expected: SELECT extract(timezone_hour FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04:30' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(TIMEZONE_MINUTE FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04:30')
expected: SELECT extract(timezone_minute FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04:30' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH       FROM TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
expected: SELECT extract(epoch FROM CAST('2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04' AS TIMETZ))

query: SELECT date_part('microsecond', TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
SELECT date_part('millisecond', TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
SELECT date_part('second',      TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')
SELECT date_part('epoch',       TIME WITH TIME ZONE '2020-05-26 13:30:25.575401-04')

CREATE VIEW timetz_local_view AS SELECT f1 AS dat, timezone(f1) AS dat_func, f1 AT LOCAL AS dat_at_local, f1 AT TIME ZONE current_setting('TimeZone') AS dat_at_tz, f1 AT TIME ZONE INTERVAL '00:00' AS dat_at_int FROM TIMETZ_TBL ORDER BY f1
expected: CREATE VIEW timetz_local_view AS SELECT f1 AS dat, timezone(f1) AS dat_func, timezone(f1) AS dat_at_local, timezone(current_setting('TimeZone'), f1) AS dat_at_tz, timezone(CAST('00:00' AS INTERVAL), f1) AS dat_at_int FROM timetz_tbl ORDER BY f1

query: SELECT f1 AS dat, f1 AT TIME ZONE 'UTC+10' AS dat_at_tz, f1 AT TIME ZONE INTERVAL '-10:00' AS dat_at_int FROM TIMETZ_TBL ORDER BY f1
expected: SELECT f1 AS dat, timezone('UTC+10', f1) AS dat_at_tz, timezone(CAST('-10:00' AS INTERVAL), f1) AS dat_at_int FROM timetz_tbl ORDER BY f1
